top-cc-pototal.sqlfrom: PoHeader as PoHeader, Account as Account, PoLine as PoLine
top-cc-pototal.sqlwhere: PoHeader.icPoHeader = PoLine.icPoHeader and PoLine.icAccount = Account.id.icLine and PoHeader.icPoHeader = Account.id.icHeader and ( PoHeader.poDate >= :as_baseReportDate ) and PoHeader.status > '3020' and PoHeader.status < '9000' and PoHeader.lastRevision = 'C' AND Account.fld2 IS NOT NULL
top-cc-pototal.title: Top Cost Centers By Order Total Report
